Willie Esterhuizen bụ onye Afrikaans na-eme ihe nkiri, odee na onye nduzi
A maara ya maka ọrụ ya na usoro TV a ma ama Vetkoekpaleis na Gauteng-aleng-aleng
Esterhuizen nwetara ọzụzụ ịgba egwú na Mahadum nke Cape Town, mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị ọ gụrụ ihe nkiri ruo afọ abụọ na Arts Educational School na London
Afọ abụọ ka e mesịrị, ọ ghọrọ onye otu KRUIK wee kwaga Johannesburg ịrụ ọrụ telivishọn.
Dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri:
